## Description {#details}

This class is used to represent a candidate for loop fusion.

When it is constructed, it checks the conditions for loop fusion to ensure that it represents a valid candidate. It caches several parts of a loop that are used throughout loop fusion (e.g., loop preheader, loop header, etc) instead of continually querying the underlying <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> to retrieve these values. It is assumed these will not change throughout loop fusion.

The invalidate method should be used to indicate that the <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-loopfuse-cpp-/fusioncandidate">FusionCandidate</a> is no longer a valid candidate for fusion. Similarly, the <a href="#a516640cfe68e1b63251dd7d87c3adaa1">isValid()</a> method can be used to ensure that the <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-loopfuse-cpp-/fusioncandidate">FusionCandidate</a> is still valid for fusion.

Definition at line 144 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopfuse-cpp">LoopFuse.cpp</a>.

### getEntryBlock() {#af05db6896587c2826dd97fa443a8e260}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>BasicBlock &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopFuse.cpp&#125;::FusionCandidate::getEntryBlock () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Get the entry block for this fusion candidate.

If this fusion candidate represents a guarded loop, the entry block is the loop guard block. If it represents an unguarded loop, the entry block is the preheader of the loop.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopfuse-cpp/#l00255">255</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopfuse-cpp">LoopFuse.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getNonLoopBlock() {#a3f9422bc7988a8d974f4477d56a94b58}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>BasicBlock &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopFuse.cpp&#125;::FusionCandidate::getNonLoopBlock () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Given a guarded loop, get the successor of the guard that is not in the loop.

This method returns the successor of the loop guard that is not located within the loop (i.e., the successor of the guard that is not the preheader). This method is only valid for guarded loops.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopfuse-cpp/#l00280">280</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopfuse-cpp">LoopFuse.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isEligibleForFusion() {#a1f677960b0a306e237ee9fa3b838639d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopFuse.cpp&#125;::FusionCandidate::isEligibleForFusion (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Determine if a fusion candidate (representing a loop) is eligible for fusion.

Note that this only checks whether a single loop can be fused - it does not check whether it is <em>legal</em> to fuse two loops together.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopfuse-cpp/#l00317">317</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopfuse-cpp">LoopFuse.cpp</a>.

### DT {#ac9e172dbe8ae6427270033a0864a9fcb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DominatorTree&amp; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopFuse.cpp&#125;::FusionCandidate::DT</>}>
Dominator and PostDominator trees are needed for the <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-loopfuse-cpp-/fusioncandidatecompare">FusionCandidateCompare</a> function, required by <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-loopfuse-cpp-/#a8974eb1cd0d99da470c576c3b3388bf6">FusionCandidateSet</a> to determine where the <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-loopfuse-cpp-/fusioncandidate">FusionCandidate</a> should be inserted into the set.

These are used to establish ordering of the FusionCandidates based on dominance.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopfuse-cpp/#l00180">180</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopfuse-cpp">LoopFuse.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Preheader {#adc8c271beba911eb5fa45d229afc43c7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>BasicBlock&#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopFuse.cpp&#125;::FusionCandidate::Preheader</>}>
Cache of parts of the loop used throughout loop fusion.

These should not need to change throughout the analysis and transformation. These parts are cached to avoid repeatedly looking up in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> class. Preheader of the loop this candidate represents

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopfuse-cpp/#l00150">150</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopfuse-cpp">LoopFuse.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
